content: remove the center marker as it is encountered be careful at the center to make sure the v created by the decreases lines up using the ends of the length of yarn you used to graft your cowl finish the i-cord edges of the seam by sewing the ends into the work to mimic the i-cord you should now have a continuous loop of knitting >> finishing weave in all yarn ends soak your finished cowl and gently wet block © 2019 jennifer peck all rights reserved 4 pattern for personal use only questions contact websterstreetknittery@gmail com
